nodes.text: Ajax's squad was a unit led by Sergeant Maximian Ajax in the Alliance to Restore the Republic's 61st Mobile Infantry. During a raid on an Imperial heavy freighter in 3 ABY, Ajax's squad made a choke point on one of the Imperial heavy freighter's main passage ways. When the squads were ordered to withdraw, they found themselves pinned down and First Sergeant Hazram Namir came in to rescue them. Although his soldiers made it out, Ajax died with a grenade in his hand, shouting obscenities.
Ajax's squad first appeared in the novel Battlefront: Twilight Company, written by Alexander Freed.
